mapper.select: SELECT student_id, name, gender, department, major, grade, username FROM graduate
SELECT student_id, name, gender, department, major, grade, username FROM graduate WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR student_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
SELECT student_id, name, gender, department, major, grade, username FROM graduate LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE graduate SET name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, department = #{department}, major = #{major}, grade = #{grade}, username = #{username}, password = IFNULL (#{password}, password) WHERE student_id = #{studentId}
